flavorText: Action: Using the original art of Colossal Dreadmaw as inspiration, design an illusionary version of the dinosaur.

foreignData.flavorText: Action: Nehmen Sie die ursprüngliche Illustration des Kolossalen Schreckensmauls als Vorlage und entwerfen Sie eine illusionäre Version des Dinosauriers.
foreignData.name: Traumschreckensmaul
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn das Traumschreckensmaul das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, opfere es.

foreignData.flavorText: Acción: Inspirándote en el arte original del Fauces pavorosas colosal, diseña una versión ilusoria del dinosaurio.
foreignData.name: Fauces pavorosas fantasmal
foreignData.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando el Fauces pavorosas fantasmal sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad, sacrifícalo.

foreignData.flavorText: Action : en vous inspirant de l'illustration originale du Gueuleffroi colossal, concevez une version spectrale du dinosaure.
foreignData.name: Gueuleffroi fantasmatique
foreignData.text:
Piétinement
Quand le Gueuleffroi fantasmatique devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité, sacrifiez-le.

foreignData.flavorText: Azione: usando l'illustrazione originale della Fauce del Terrore Colossale come ispirazione, disegna una versione illusoria del dinosauro.
foreignData.name: Fauce del Terrore Fantasma
foreignData.text:
Travolgere
Quando la Fauce del Terrore Fantasma diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità, sacrificala.

foreignData.flavorText: 指示：《巨大な戦慄大口》の元のイラストを参考にして、その恐竜をイリュージョンにしたものをデザイン。
foreignData.name: 幻影の戦慄大口
foreignData.text:
トランプル
幻影の戦慄大口が呪文や能力の対象になったとき、これを生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜・イリュージョン

foreignData.flavorText: 행동: 거대한 공포턱의 원본 삽화를 참고로 해서, 환영 버전의 공룡을 디자인해 주십시오.
foreignData.name: 허깨비 공포턱
foreignData.text:
돌진
허깨비 공포턱이 주문 또는 능력의 목표가 될 때, 허깨비 공포턱을 희생한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ação: Usando a arte original de Bocarra Sinistra Colossal como inspiração, desenhe uma versão ilusória do dinossauro.
foreignData.name: Bocarra Sinistra Fantasmal
foreignData.text:
Atropelar
Quando Bocarra Sinistra Fantasmal se tornar alvo de uma mágica ou habilidade, sacrifique-a.

foreignData.flavorText: Действие: используя в качестве источника вдохновения оригинальную иллюстрацию Исполинского Смертеглота, нарисуйте иллюзорную версию этого динозавра.
foreignData.name: Призрачный Смертеглот
foreignData.text:
Пробивной удар
Когда Призрачный Смертеглот становится целью заклинания или способности, пожертвуйте его.

foreignData.flavorText: 画面动态：请基于原版「庞巨血口龙」插画，设计相同恐龙的虚影版本。
foreignData.name: 幻象血口龙
foreignData.text:
践踏
当幻象血口龙成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

foreignData.flavorText: 畫面動態：請基於原版「龐巨血口龍」插畫，設計相同恐龍的虛影版本。
foreignData.name: 幻象血口龍
foreignData.text:
踐踏
當幻象血口龍成為咒語或異能的目標時，將它犧牲。

name: Phantasmal Dreadmaw
originalText:
Trample
When Phantasmal Dreadmaw becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

rulings.text: If Phantasmal Dreadmaw becomes the target of a spell or ability, its ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Phantasmal Dreadmaw will be sacrificed before that spell or ability tries to resolve. Unless the spell or ability has another target, it will then be removed from the stack as it tries to resolve for having no legal targets.
Countering the spell or ability will not save Phantasmal Dreadmaw from being sacrificed.

text:
Trample
When Phantasmal Dreadmaw becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
